column2: we've been twice and have recommended to friends. Great tapas and excellent sangria. This trip we tried bacon wrapped dates
column3: so delightful. We also had mango sangria that we loved and a smoked salmon and caper dish. I would skip the heirloom tomato salad
column4: somewhat bland and very expensive for one tomato cut up with cucumber. Also tried a chocolate almond dessert
column5: delicious and dense like a creamy fudge. Loved it!
